changelog: Efficiency Tracker: Added a Clicks Saved statistic in the App Info section. See exactly how much effort EL is saving you every day!
Advanced Sorting: You can now organize your profiles alphabetically or by creation/last edit date. Keep your hangar organized!
Improved Launch Logic (Working Directory): Fixed a critical issue where some apps failed to start because they couldn't locate their internal files. EL now correctly sets the execution context.
UI Integrity: Enforced a minimum window size to prevent interface glitches during resizing.
Tooltip Redesign: Fixed the main app selection tooltip (bubble) overflow issue. It now displays correctly regardless of window position.
Localization: Added missing translations for Wait and SEC across all supported languages.
Experimental Icon Fix: Addressed a bug where apps sometimes showed the shortcut icon instead of their native icon. Note: This is an experimental fix â€” please let me know if it works for you!
